summary: Adult, Extreme sex HQ animations with uniques animobjects for Sexlab/SLAL
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone.

Here are my animations 'pack' to use with 'SLAL'. 
These animations are made by giving priority to quality to look like little movies.
Therefore they are long, contains many stages, transitions, varied smooth motions, and all custom built objects.
Read the instructions below to get the best of this mod. 
This contains actually nine animations or around 30 minutes of extreme hot sex, only girls versus various objects, dildo, "pendulum", sexmachines, tentacles.

Oh yeah... They are not lore friendly, this is not my goal. ;)

You can check this topic where I'm the most active:
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/61588-slal-komotors-animations/]http://www.loverslab.com/topic/61588-slal-komotors-animations/[/url]

---------------------------------------------------
/!\ Read Before launch Animations /!\
---------------------------------------------------
Scale actors at the same size, tick the option in Sexlab Menu. (This will work without it, but it will not be aligned properly.)All these animations (excepted Komachinery Table) use a timer for transitions: SET timers at 220 seconds for all stages, and active automatic stages progression in sexlab menu.If the animations appear to be out of sync and you have clipping, reload the animation with the sexlab shortcut key (check this in your sexlab menu)

---------------------------------------------------
/!\ Read for the KoMachine Animation /!\
---------------------------------------------------
This is a 3 actors animation, so you really need 3 actors to use this animation.
actor 1: is the main victim/actor
actor 2: control the machine
actor 3: control the prolapse & feet "elevator". 
So use the MatchMaker (or similar) Mod to select your actors.
1. use self spell on you,
2. spell on actor 2,
3. spell on actor 3.
You will not see the 2 "control" actors, they are hidden in a 'box'.

---------------------------------------------------
/!\ Read for the KoMachinery Table Animation /!\
---------------------------------------------------
This is a 2 actors animation, so you really need 2 actors to use this animation. 
actor 1: is the main victim/actor
actor 2: control the machine 
Use MassMatchMaker: 1. use self spell on you, 2. spell on actor 2

---------------------------------------------------
/!\ Read for the Animated Camera /!\
---------------------------------------------------
(Only used for Lesbian Dildo Show in 0.8a version)
Use the "3" key (numpad) to change the camera and reload animation with your sexlab shortcut key.
The best result is a fov between 55 and 60: open the console and type "fov 55" or "fov 60" (whitout " " )

[u]Required:[/u] 
- Skyrim
- [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE
[/url]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url]
- [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/150-skyrim-sexlab-sex-animation-framework-v162-updated-jun-3rd-2016/]Sexlab[/url]
- [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/2488-sexlab-animation-loader/]SexLab Animation Loader[/url]
- [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/17343-sexlab-matchmaker-updated-09172014/]MatchMaker
[/url]- [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/4007-hdt-sextoys/]HDT Sextoys[/url] (optionnal but Highly recommended)
